message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $9,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $8,200. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $7,800. I think that's the maximum I can stretch for this product.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $8,500. I think the product's value is worth more than that. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm offering it to you for $8,400. This is my final offer. What do you think?
